title: Will my laptop play LoL?
body:
Hi guys, 
Just recently got a new laptop, Lenovo Yoga 920, mostly for photo editing purposes. Was wondering if it would be able to run league comfortably as well? Specs are 
CPU: Intel Core i7-8550U   1.80GHz  1.99GHz
GPU: Intel UHD Graphics 620
RAM: 16GB DDR4

Since its quad core I thought there might be a chance it could handle it, but thought I'd ask before waiting forever for it to download.
Thanks!

replies.body:
Yes it will.

I got league running on a i5-2540, GeForce 610M with 6GB RAM.

Im sure your little beasty will run it fine.
Thanks :) was just worried about the 1.8GHz as league says it requires 2GHz.

From what I read thats the base clock speed, it has it's own inbuilt turbo of up to 4.0GHz across all cores. 
You should be fine running it, might get a little warm so keep it elevated and have enough air circulating the inlets.
Yeeeaaa this will probably run league just fine ^_^! You can always check out the [**minimum specs page**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654) in the future!
